meanings.definition: A thin, crisp Italian waffle cookie typically flavored with anise.
meanings.sent1: My grandmother makes delicious pizzellas during the holidays.
meanings.sent2: I bought a pack of pizzellas from the bakery for a snack.
meanings.sent3: The pizzella was so light and crispy, it almost floated off the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like the sweet aroma of a freshly baked pizzella.
meanings.sent5: The pizzella melted in my mouth, leaving a delightful anise flavor.

meanings.definition: The act of making or eating pizzellas.
meanings.sent1: We all gathered in the kitchen for a fun pizzella-making session.
meanings.sent2: The family enjoyed a cozy evening of pizzella eating by the fireplace.
meanings.sent3: Their competition for the fastest pizzella eater was intense and hilarious.
meanings.sent4: The joy on their faces while eating pizzellas was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter filled the room during the pizzella feast.

meanings.sent1: I savored every bite of the delicious pizzella.
meanings.sent2: She handed me a warm pizzella fresh from the oven.
meanings.sent3: The pizzella sat temptingly on the plate, calling my name.
meanings.sent4: The pizzella was a tiny taste of Italy in my hand.
meanings.sent5: The delicate design on the pizzella made it almost too pretty to eat.
